markets.title: Will Real Madrid win the 2025-26 Champions League?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Real Madrid wins the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League final. The final is scheduled for May 30, 2026 at the Allianz Arena in Munich. Resolves NO if any other team wins.

markets.title: Will Manchester City win the Premier League 2025-26?
markets.description: Resolves YES if Manchester City finishes first in the English Premier League at the end of the 2025-26 season (May 2026). Resolves NO if any other team wins the title.

markets.description: Resolves YES if Liverpool finishes in the top 4 of the Premier League 2025-26 season, securing Champions League qualification. Resolves NO if they finish 5th or lower.

markets.description: Resolves YES if FAA certifies any eVTOL (electric vertical takeoff and landing) 'flying car' for commercial passenger use in U.S. by December 31, 2026.

markets.description: Resolves YES if any of the top 10 US banks (by assets) launches Bitcoin custody/storage services for retail customers during 2026. TradFi crypto integration.

markets.title: Will AI-generated song top Billboard Hot 100 in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if a song created primarily with AI (vocals, lyrics, or production) reaches #1 on Billboard Hot 100 chart during 2026. AI music revolution.

markets.title: Will Ozempic be approved for general weight loss by FDA in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if FDA approves Ozempic (semaglutide) for general weight loss indication (not just diabetes) during 2026. Weight loss drug revolution expanding.

markets.title: Will major hurricane hit NYC area in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if a Category 3+ hurricane makes landfall in the New York City metropolitan area during 2026 hurricane season. Climate change increasing extreme weather risk.

markets.title: Will cannabis be federally legalized in US in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if U.S. federal government removes cannabis from Schedule I and legalizes recreational cannabis nationwide during 2026. Major drug policy reform.

markets.title: Will Jeff Bezos return to Amazon as CEO in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if Jeff Bezos announces return to Amazon as CEO (or equivalent executive role) during 2026. Founder return speculation amid Andy Jassy tenure.

markets.title: Will brain upload technology be successfully demonstrated in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if any organization successfully demonstrates uploading human consciousness or complete brain state to a computer during 2026. Sci-fi becoming reality.

markets.title: Will Disney acquire Netflix in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if Disney announces acquisition or merger with Netflix during 2026. Mega streaming consolidation deal speculation.

markets.title: Will permanent moon base be announced by any nation in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if any country officially announces plans to establish a permanent lunar base with construction beginning before 2030 (announcement made in 2026).

markets.title: Will human receive transplant from genetically modified pig in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if a human patient receives and survives (30+ days) an organ transplant from a genetically modified pig (xenotransplant) during 2026. Medical breakthrough.

markets.title: Will US ban gas-powered car sales in any state by 2035? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if any U.S. state passes legislation banning sale of new gasoline-powered vehicles by 2035 (law passed during 2026). Climate policy acceleration.

markets.title: Will Cristiano Ronaldo retire from professional soccer in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if Cristiano Ronaldo officially announces retirement from professional soccer/football during 2026. End of an era for legendary player.

markets.title: Will UFO/UAP disclosure event happen in US in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if U.S. government holds official disclosure event confirming non-human intelligence or extraterrestrial contact during 2026. UAP hearings intensifying.

markets.title: Will AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) be achieved in 2026? (Hypothetical Market)
markets.description: Resolves YES if any organization credibly demonstrates AGI - human-level artificial intelligence across all cognitive tasks - during 2026. Alignment debates reaching fever pitch.
